source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_00<tab>Notched Bone and Dedean seem to be on the brink of starvation.

TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_01<tab>It seems that Notched Bone and Dedean have not eaten in quite some time and they are understandably very hungry. What is less understandable is their refusal to eat the food they have been provisioned with by the goblins. They are under the impression that it is poisoned and are completely unreceptive to suggestions to the contrary. Notched Bone asks you to slay a crawler and harvest its flesh such that he and Dedean may eat. Raw crawler flesh is inedible, but it should be fine if cooked thoroughly. Notched Bone asks that after harvesting the crawler meat, you roast it at the goblin bonfire in the Answering Quarter. Feed these stubborn two now, and deal with their prejudices later.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_01<tab>Kerbiger Knochen und Dedean haben Hunger und wollen, dass du ihnen <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B6D020502 /var> brätst und bringst. Falls du ihnen den Gefallen tun willst, mach dich im Akademie-Viertel auf die Jagd nach <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 02F20E13020402 /var> und besorge <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B6D020502 /var>.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_02<tab>You slay a crawler and gather a good, large slice of its flesh. Even someone on the brink of starvation would not eat this meat raw. Roast the slice of crawler flesh at the bonfire in the Answering Quarter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_02<tab>Die wichtigste Zutat hast du schon mal, jetzt musst du <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B6D020502 /var> nur noch an <var 32 ((EObj)) 02F61E9C58020402 /var> in der Nähe braten.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_03<tab>You find the bonfire Notched Bone described and slowly roast the crawler flesh, thoroughly cooking it all the way through. Deliver the roasted crawler flesh to Notched Bone and Dedean back at Idyllshire.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_03<tab>Du hast mit Meisterhand <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B6E020502 /var> zubereitet. Bring Kerbiger Knochen seine Mahlzeit nach Frohehalde.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_04<tab>You deliver the crawler meat to Notched Bone and Dedean. Now that they have something to sate their empty stomachs, they hand you the jerked water buffalo meat that the goblins supplied them with. They ask you to return it to the goblin who gave it to them─the coalshifter goblin near the bonfire over which you cooked the crawler flesh.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_04<tab>Da er ja nun <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B6E020502 /var> hat, gibt dir Kerbiger Knochen <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B6F020502 /var>. Diese milde Gabe hatte Dedean zuvor von dem Lagerfeuer-Goblin erhalten, doch misstrauisch, wie sie sind, wollen sie, dass du sie dem Goblin zurückbringst. Liefere das verschmähte Geschenk bei ihm ab.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_05<tab>You return the jerked water buffalo to the coalshifter goblin, explaining that the two refugees have secured an alternate source of sustenance in the crawlers that roam the hinterlands. Upon hearing this, the goblin becomes very concerned. No matter how it is prepared, crawler flesh is inedible and can cause severe stomach pains in goblins. He doubts that Lalafell or Roegadyn will fare any better from eating it. He provides you with some gobbietea, which should help to alleviate any stomach problems the two refugees might suffer, and requests that you return to the two and check on their well-being.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_05<tab>Als der Lagerfeuer-Goblin hört, dass Kerbiger Knochen und Dedean <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B6E020502 /var> gegessen haben, ist er höchst besorgt um das Wohl der beiden. Er gibt dir einen magenstärkenden Tee für sie mit. Bring ihn schnell zu Kerbiger Knochen nach Frohehalde.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_06<tab>It seems that the coalshifter goblin's concerns were well founded. You find Notched Bone and Dedean racked with terrible stomach pains. Administer the gobbietea. It should ameliorate the symptoms they are suffering.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_06<tab>Als du dort ankommst, winden sich Kerbiger Knochen und Dedean bereits vor Magenschmerzen. Wende <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B70020502 /var> auf die beiden an.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_07<tab>The gobbietea starts to take effect immediately. Though they are still in pain, Notched Bone's and Dedean's conditions seem to be improving rapidly. Speak with Notched Bone and explain that the medicine that cured him was provided by the same goblin that gave him the jerked water buffalo meat that he refused to eat.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_07<tab>Der Tee hat seine Wirkung entfaltet und die Magenschmerzen der beiden gelindert. Sprich mit Kerbiger Knochen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_08<tab>Notched Bone is shocked to learn that the medicine came from a goblin. He is still somewhat skeptical about the goblins' motivations, explaining that in all their time as refugees, he and Dedean have only ever experienced kindness as part of a plan to cheat them. It was just such a ploy that led them to be tricked into debt in Ul'dah, forcing them to leave the nation and find a new home.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_08<tab>Kerbiger Knochen ist froh, dass die Schmerzen nachgelassen haben, aber als er hört, dass der Tee von einem Goblin kommt, wird er gleich wieder misstrauisch. Wenn jemand nett zu ihm gewesen sei, habe die Sache bisher noch immer einen Haken gehabt!

TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_SEQ_10<tab>

TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_00<tab>Obtain crawler flesh from a crawler.
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_01<tab>Roast the crawler flesh on the bonfire.
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the roasted crawler flesh to Notched Bone.
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_03<tab>Return the jerked water buffalo to the goblin coalshifter.
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Notched Bone.
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_05<tab>Cure Notched Bone with the gobbietea.
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_06<tab>Cure Dedean with the gobbietea.
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Notched Bone.

TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_TODO_23<tab>

TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_000<tab>I just can't work out how we're gonna cure these people of this horrible goblin brainwashin'. But I'm so hungry I can barely think! Maybe if I had a good meal, I'd be able to work it out...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_000<tab>Wir müssen herausfinden, wie die Goblins die Abenteurer gefügig machen. Aber vorher steht noch ein dringenderer Punkt auf dem Programm: was zu essen organisieren! Über all der Goblinbeobachtung hab ich das glatt vergessen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_001<tab>I'm starving too! Do you think we should eat that jerked water buffalo we got from the goblin at the bonfire?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_001<tab>Wie wär's mit <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B6F020402 /var> hier, Kerbiger Knochen? Hab ich von diesem Lagerfeuer-Goblin bekommen ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_002<tab>Don't be a fool, Dedean! Food from a goblin? It might be poisoned!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_002<tab>Dedean, du Idiot! Denk doch mal nach! Das ist doch sonnenklar, dass sie da irgendwelche bewusstseinsverändernden Stoffe reingemischt haben!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_003<tab>Don't look so skeptical. Why would the goblins go givin' refugees like us perfectly good meat? Hm? Now, those crawlers outside─they have a fair bit of flesh on 'em. Could you kill one and bring us a nice good slice of its meat? I think we're both too weak from hunger to do it ourselves...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_003<tab>Jetzt ist es Zeit, Farbe zu bekennen, <var 08 E905 ((Mädchen)) ((Freund)) /var> - auf wessen Seite stehst du? Auf unserer, will ich doch wohl hoffen?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_004<tab>I doubt it's edible raw. There's a bonfire in the Answering Quarter. If you roasted the meat there, I figure it'd come out pretty good. Please hurry. I'm so hungry I can barely move.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_004<tab>Das kannst du unter Beweis stellen, indem du uns das Fleisch von <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F20E13030402 /var> aus dem Akademie-Viertel besorgst - appetitlich sehen die Viecher nicht aus, aber immerhin sollte ordentlich was dran sein. Und bitte vorher an <var 32 ((EObj)) 02F61E9C58020402 /var> braten, roh kriegt man das Zeug sicher nicht runter.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_010<tab>Please, adventurer, get us a nice, big slice of meat off of one of them crawlers wrigglin' around the hinterlands.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_010<tab>Jetzt ist es Zeit, Farbe zu bekennen, <var 08 E905 ((Mädchen)) ((Freund)) /var> - auf wessen Seite stehst du? Auf unserer, will ich doch wohl hoffen?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_011<tab>I doubt you can eat 'em raw. There's a bonfire in the Answering Quarter─roast the meat there and bring it back here. Please hurry. We're so weak from hunger, we can barely move!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_011<tab>Das kannst du unter Beweis stellen, indem du uns das Fleisch von <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F20E13030402 /var> aus dem Akademie-Viertel besorgst. Und bitte vorher an <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9C58020402 /var> braten, roh kriegt man das Zeug nämlich nicht runter.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_012<tab>I can't take it any longer. I think I'd eat just about anything. Except that horrible poisoned water buffalo meat those goblins are trying to trick us into eating!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_012<tab>Uff, ich kann mich schon gar nicht mehr auf den Beinen halten. Ich brauch irgendwas zwischen die Zähne, und zwar bald.

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_020<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Do you want to use bonfire, uplander? Roast any tastymeats you want! Just don't let fire go out.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_020<tab>Willzu was rösten, Großwachsene<var 08 E905 (()) ((r)) /var>? Wennzu Flamme nicht löschst, kannzu gerne benutzen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_030<tab>Oh! Adventurer! Thank the gods you're back. I thought I was about to pass out from hunger...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_030<tab>Hast du was zu essen besorgt? Uns hängt der Magen schon bis zu den Kniekehlen!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_031<tab>Mmm! This ain't bad at all! Guess we don't need that jerked water buffalo after all! I'll bet it's poisoned anyway.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_031<tab>Oho, das sieht ja ganz appetitlich aus - richtig professionell geröstet. Du bist nicht zufällig Gourmet im Nebenberuf? Dann könntest du uns nämlich öfter was kochen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_032<tab>Clearly you had no trouble findin' that bonfire we mentioned. Do you think you might be able to take this jerked meat back to the goblin who tends it? We sure don't want it.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_032<tab>So, <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B6F020502 /var> brauchen wir jetzt auch nicht mehr. Bring das mal schön zu dem Lagerfeuer-Goblin zurück. Ich will nicht riskieren, vergiftet zu werden.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_033<tab>You go tell that goblin we don't need his poisoned food. We've got this delicious roasted crawler meat! Hahaha!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_033<tab>Und wir werden uns inzwischen an <var 32 ((EventItem)) 04F61E8B6E020402 /var> gütlich tun! Har har har!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_043<tab>You take that jerked water buffalo back to the goblin at the bonfire. We're gonna finish off this crawler meat before it gets cold.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_043<tab><var 2B ((<var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B6F020502 /var>)) /var> brauchen wir jetzt nicht mehr. Bring das mal schön zu dem Lagerfeuer-Goblin zurück. Ich will nicht riskieren, vergiftet zu werden.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_044<tab>Give that jerked water buffalo back to the goblin near the bonfire. We don't want those filthy goblins thinking we owe them anything.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_044<tab>Damit stehen wir auch nicht mehr in der Schuld des Goblins ... Was wir sowieso nicht wären, wenn ich gleich nichts von ihm angenommen hätte ... Aber egal! Wir sind von niemandem abhängig, jawohl!

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_040<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
I am just humble bonfire gobbie. Can I help you?

TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_041<tab>This is jerked water buffalo I gave to refugees. They eat roast crawler flesh instead? Is that safe? Can uplanders eat that meat? It gives us gobbies horrible bellypains.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_041<tab>Großwachsene wollen lieber Kriecher essen als Büffelfleisch? Bizzu sicher? Kannzu ganz rumpelnde Bauch bekommen von <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8B6E020202 /var> ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_042<tab>I am very worried about the refugees' bellies. Please take this gobbietea. It is good for curing bellypains.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_042<tab>Bringzzu lieber Tee für Magen zu Freunde! Sonst wird sicher toilettelaufen für Ganzetag.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_052<tab>If refugees have bellypains, gobbietea should cure it!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_GOBLIN01953_000_052<tab>Bringzzu lieber Tee für Magen zu Freunde! Sonst wird sicher toilettelaufen für Ganzetag.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_051<tab>Ungh... My stomach... Maybe we should have just eaten that jerked water buffalo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_051<tab>Ehrlich, wir hätten doch lieber <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B6F020502 /var> essen sollen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_050<tab>A-Adventurer... My guts are on fire. I feel like I'm gonna die. Are those crawlers still poisonous even after you roast them right through?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_050<tab>Ahrg ... Also ich weiß nicht, dein Fleisch ... Das war nicht so ganz das Wahre! In meinem Bauch rumort es ganz gewaltig ... <stöhn>

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_061<tab>What is this? Medicine? Thank you...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_061<tab>Magentee ...? Her damit! Wenn nur diese Bauchschmerzen wieder aufhören!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_084<tab>Ungh... I've gotta make it through this. I have to protect Dedean... But I think that tea is workin'. The pain is a little better now.
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_071<tab>Ungh... I can see my dead grandma. She's calling me─asking me to go with her... I should take that medicine.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_071<tab>Ich seh schon lauter violette Kreise vor den Augen ... <wimmer>

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_083<tab>Sorry, Grandma. Not today. I can't leave Notched Bone behind... Th-This tea─I think it's working! My stomach feels better already!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_083<tab>Aaah ... Bilde ich mir das ein, oder haben die Magenkrämpfe tatsächlich schon nachgelassen ...?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_080<tab>That tea seems to be workin'. I still feel pretty awful, but it's gettin' better by the minute. Sorry for havin' caused you all this trouble, adventurer. I'm truly moved by your kindness.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_080<tab>Puh, dem Tod noch mal von der Schippe gesprungen! Das wär aber auch ein verdammt unrühmliches Ende gewesen. Danke dir, Abenteurer<var 08 E905 ((in)) (()) /var>. Wenn du nicht gewesen wärst ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_081<tab>A goblin was worried about us? He gave you that tea? I find that mighty hard to believe. There ain't a soul in the realm who gives a damn about us. Any time someone's pretended to care, it was just part of some trick. Just like that godsdamned bastard who tricked us into debt back in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_081<tab>Den Tee hat dir der Goblin mitgegeben? Weil er sich Sorgen um unseren Magen gemacht hat? Das ... Das gibt's doch nicht.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_082<tab>But you're the first person we've met who actually seems to care... Look, them goblins gave us much more food than just that jerked water buffalo. Please, take some of this for your troubles. I still ain't convinced it's not poisoned, though.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_082<tab>Bisher hat sich noch nie einer um uns gekümmert. Und wenn, dann nur, damit er uns anschließend ausnehmen konnte. Und diesmal soll es anders sein? Hah, wer's glaubt!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_NOTCHEDBONE_000_060<tab>deleted
TEXT_HEAVNZ823_01953_DEDEAN_000_070<tab>deleted
